content: अनस् {%<ab>n.</ab>%} [अनिति शब्दायते अन्-असुन्] {@--1@} A cart; उद्गाता चाप्यनः क्रये <ls>Ms. 8. 209</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 184</ls>, <ls n="Y.">3. 269</ls>, <ls>Śi. 12. 26.</ls> {@--2@} [ अनिति जीवत्यनेन] Food, boiled rice. {@--3@} Birth. {@--4@} A living being. {@--5@} A kitchen. {@--6@} A parent (father or mother); said to be {%<ab>f.</ab>%} in these two senses. At the end of Avyayībhāva <ab>comp.</ab> अनस् is changed to अनस; as अध्यनसं &c.; also at the end of <ab>Tat.</ab> Comp.; महानसं &c.
